name: Beekeeping Simulator
description:
Wake the buzz up beekeeper, we have an apiary to run ! 

So get your things up and prepare, because the clients have all gathered to come and buy your wonderful honey !

How to play : 

Bees produce and consume nectar. It helps them grow and make bigger hives. When one of your hives reaches 10 bees, it will start producing honey from its nectar. Fill your extractor with honey and mash the space bar to use it and make some beautiful honey pots that will be sold automatically to the clients passing by. 

You can then use your money to upgrade your extractor, or build a new hive. To build and additional hive, just click on the button and click where you want your hive to be.
